gloss.$t: three-pronged vajra flung by Kukai on his return from China to determine the Holy Land of Esoteric Buddhism
Donnerkeil mit je drei Spitzen an jedem Ende (im esoterischen Buddhismus)
copper or iron implement, pointed at both ends, used in esoteric Buddhist rituals
Donnerkeil mit je einer Spitze an jedem Ende (im esoterischen Buddhismus)
ground stone tool from the late Jomon period (named after its similarity to the Buddhist tokko)
ground stone tool from the late Jomon period
